mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, k.seckill_id 'seckill.seckill_id', k.name 'seckill.name', k.number 'seckill.number', k.start_time 'seckill.start_time', k.end_time 'seckill.end_time', k.create_time 'seckill_end_time' FROM success_seckilled sk INNER JOIN seckill k on sk.seckill_id = k.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId};
